library(tidyverse)
source("http://www.openintro.org/stat/data/cdc.R")
cdc <- as_tibble(cdc)



```{r}
ggplot(data = cdc) + 
  geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = smoke100, fill = genhlth)) +
  ggtitle("Health of Non Smokers vs. Smokers") +
  labs(y= "People", x = "Non Smokers                                              Smokers")+
  labs(fill ="Health Quality")

```
